entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:38 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
